alert.note: Alert for Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 1:51PM CST until November 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Loving County, and Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor and Reeves County Plains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.

area.areaDesc: Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
